body_html:
Based on https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/illegal-instruction-core-dumped-for-cuda-in-1-0-0-dev/26550/5, this looks like an SSE4.1 instruction executing on a CPU without SSE4.1 support.

Christian's PR, which removes the SSE compilation flags, should fix this.

#12109
body_text:

Christian's PR, which removes the SSE compilation flags, should fix this.
#12109
body:
Based on https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/illegal-instruction-core-dumped-for-cuda-in-1-0-0-dev/26550/5, this looks like an SSE4.1 instruction executing on a CPU without SSE4.1 support.

Christian's PR, which removes the SSE compilation flags, should fix this.

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12109
